    • Method Detail

      • getItems

        protected abstract ArrayList<? extends com.ardock.moodapp.moodock.lib.data.persistence.utils.IConvertible> getItems()
        Gets the ArrayList of items The subclasses must define a private static final ArrayList of IConvertible or subclass and return a reference as a implementation of this method and make it final
        Returns:
        the ArrayList of items

      • sortItems

        protected abstract void sortItems()
        Sorts the ArrayList of items if possible and it's needed, else do nothing. If the class implements Comparable, implement method with Collections.sort(items); Else leave this method empty. addItem/s & updateItems methods will sort the items if possible, as defined in the class.

      • addUnsortedItem

        public abstract void addUnsortedItem(com.ardock.moodapp.moodock.lib.data.persistence.utils.IConvertible item)
        Add item to the list without sort You will need to cast the IConvertible to the real class, i.e. items.add((Post) item);
        Parameters:
        item - the item to add

      • getItem

        public Object getItem(int position)
        Get the data item associated with the specified position in the data set.
        Parameters:

      • getItemId

        public long getItemId(int position)
        Get the row id associated with the specified position in the list.
        Parameters:
        position - The position of the item within the adapter's data set whose row id we want.
        Returns:
        The id of the item at the specified position.
